column4: So I got a problem.. where I'm 10 hours busy with now. I got troubles configuring my gigaset usb adapter 108. With ndiswrapper -l it tells me that the adapter is installed, but the interface wlan0 isn't here... Anyone has ideas?
can you "hard" connect while t/s the wireless card?
Is it an Atheros chipset? I just dealt with that a couple of days ago...
idk.. it's a gigaset usb adapter
Hrmmm... Thinking about what I did...
Yes, it shows nothing about my ndiswrapper I think.
checking my box for you... one sec...
should see at least SOMETHING in there...
I would have to reboot for that.. but could you paste what's there?
for example, [   21.640429] iwl3945: Intel(R) PRO/Wireless 3945ABG/BG Network Connection driver for Linux, 1.2.26ks - tells me that the hardware was successfully detected...
ndiswrapper -l doesn't tell me hardware detected, it tells me 'Vehice installed'.
I'm going to sleep now.. going to try it tommorow again, thanks tho
